article.headline: Santa Clara 74, Fresno St. 67
article.story: SANTA CLARA, Calif. -- Kevin Foster scored 16 of his season-high 25 points in the first half in leading Santa Clara past Fresno State 74-67 on Saturday as part of the West Coast Classic. Robert Smith scored a season high 17 points as the Broncos (3-3) ended a three-game losing streak. Marc Trasolini matched his career high with 12 rebounds. Raymond Cowels finished with 13 points. Sylvester Seay scored a season-high 26 points to lead the Bulldogs (2-3), who lost their third straight. Paul George scored 19 points and grabbed nine rebounds. Santa Clara led by as many as 16 in the second half. The Bulldogs were held scoreless over the final 4:44 of the first half, committing half of their 14 turnovers and missing five shot attempts over that span.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
